net.grinder.communication
Class AbstractFanOutSender

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.communication.AbstractSender
      net.grinder.communication.AbstractFanOutSender
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sender
Direct Known Subclasses:
FanOutServerSender, FanOutStreamSender
abstract class AbstractFanOutSender
extends AbstractSender

Manages the sending of messages to many Receivers.

Author:
Philip Aston
